name: V_EHI_IMD_FILTER
description: Contains information associated with remittance image records used for requisition grouper EHI export filtering.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record. A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: The requisition grouper ID from the claim associated with this remittance image.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID for this remittance image.
